TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit GacIdentityPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class GacIdentityPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 允許將 的安全性動作套用至使用宣告式安全性的程式碼。

span.span: Allows security actions for to be applied to code using declarative security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別用來確保呼叫端都已登錄在全域組件快取 (GAC) 中。This class is used to ensure that callers are registered in the global assembly cache (GAC). 允許宣告的範圍取決於用的值。The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the value that is used. 安全性屬性所宣告的安全性資訊會儲存屬性目標的中繼資料，並在執行階段存取系統。The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time. 安全性屬性僅用於宣告式安全性。Security attributes are used only for declarative security. 命令式安全性，使用對應的權限類別， 。For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class, . > [!IMPORTANT] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不會使用身分識別的權限。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used. > > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，於身分識別的權限的需求會生效，即使在呼叫組件是完全受信任。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是說，雖然呼叫組件具有完全信任，但是，如果組件不符合要求的準則識別權限的要求即會失敗。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，身分識別的權限的需求是沒有效果，如果呼叫的組件具有完全信任。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 如此可確保所有的權限，不會將身分識別的權限的特殊案例的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範 的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of . [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute/CPP/gacidentitypermissionattribute.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute/CS/gacidentitypermissionattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute/VB/gacidentitypermissionattribute.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction action) cil managed

summary.span: 使用指定的 值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式呼叫基底類別，來驗證值。The constructor calls the base class to validate the value. 這個建構函式產生關聯(例如`Demand`) 與。This constructor associates a (for example, `Demand`) with the . 安全性屬性所宣告的安全性資訊會儲存屬性目標的中繼資料，並在執行階段存取系統。The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time. 安全性屬性僅用於宣告式安全性。Security attributes are used only for declarative security. 使用命令式安全性。Use for imperative security. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用建構函式呼叫的程式會在全域組件快取的需求。The following code example demonstrates the use of the constructor to demand that the calling program be in the global assembly cache. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute/CPP/gacidentitypermissionattribute.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute/CS/gacidentitypermissionattribute.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermissionAttribute/VB/gacidentitypermissionattribute.vb#2)]

exception.span: 參數不是有效的 值。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

span.span: A that corresponds to this attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 永遠不會由應用程式程式碼，應該只能由安全性系統，呼叫這個方法。This method should be called only by the security system, never by application code. 在編譯時期，屬性會將安全性宣告轉換為中繼資料的序列化形式。At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata. 從這個方法所傳回的權限建立中繼資料中的宣告式安全性資料。Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission returned by this method.
